chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Noos is an RSS feedreader. RSS is a number of widely-used XML formats to transmit to publish and syndicate articles, for example news or blog articles. It is designed to be used on text terminals on Unix or Unix-like systems such as Linux, BSD or Mac OS X.
